channel.title: Rsps logging in issue
channel.description: Hello, I went on Matrix rsps yesterday then went back on mine and now when i log into my rsps it doesn't work. I log in and it says welcome to the game in the chat box and i can see the different options like armor, inventory, etc. but the screen where my character would be stays black and wont load. I've uninstalled and re-installed java and re downloaded the cache but it still doesnt work. I even reinstalled java and such. Is there a specific java that i need for rsps webclient running? I even tried dl client. Same thing. I got a Java SE binary has stopped working error and thats why i ran virus scan then reinstalled java again. I was wondering if anyone could help me that has experienced a problem like this! THANK YOU!

item.title: Rsps logging in issue

item.description:
@xxlongbongxx wrote:

Hello, I went on Matrix rsps yesterday then went back on mine and now when i log into my rsps it doesn’t work. I log in and it says welcome to the game in the chat box and i can see the different options like armor, inventory, etc. but the screen where my character would be stays black and wont load. I’ve uninstalled and re-installed java and re downloaded the cache but it still doesnt work. I even reinstalled java and such. Is there a specific java that i need for rsps webclient running? I even tried dl client. Same thing. I got a Java SE binary has stopped working error and thats why i ran virus scan then reinstalled java again. I was wondering if anyone could help me that has experienced a problem like this! THANK YOU!
